update.description:
Language updates.
Upgrade linux kernel to 3.10-1 (3.10.101).
Upgrade acpid to 2.0.26, bind to 9.10.3-P2, coreutils to 8.25, db to 6.1.26, dhcpcd to 6.10.1, dnsmasq to 2.75, ethtool to 4.2, glib to 2.42.2, gmp to 6.0.0a, gnupg to 1.4.20, hdparm to 9.48, iproute2 to 4.4.0, iw to 4.3, less to 481, libffi to 3.2.1, libgcrypt to 1.6.4, libgpg-error to 1.19, libnl to 3.2.27, libpcap to 1.7.4, libpng to 1.6.21, libtool to 2.4.6, lzo to 2.09, mdadm to 3.3.4, nano to 2.4.3, ntp to 4.2.8p6, openssh to 7.2p2, openssl to 1.0.2f, openvpn to 2.3.10, patch to 2.7.5, pciutils to 3.4.1, perl to 5.20.2-2, rp-pppoe to 3.12, rrdtool to 1.5.5, rsyslog to 8.11.0, shadow to 4.2.1, smartmontools to 6.4, sqlite to 3.11.1, squid to 3.4.14, tcpdump to 4.7.4, tzdata to 2016a, wget to 1.17.1, xz to 5.2.2, several Perl CPAN modules.
Upgrade e1000e network driver to 3.3.3, igb network driver to 5.3.3.5. Drop CnxADSL and pulsar drivers.
Mandatory reboot after upgrade.
